sections.title: Overview
sections.content: Define measurement and attribution: UTMs, channel taxonomy, MTA vs MMM, and source of truth.

sections.title: Data Model & Instrumentation
sections.content: Events schema, session stitching, identity resolution, consent, and data retention.

sections.title: Attribution Methods
sections.content: Rule-based (first/last, linear, time-decay), data-driven, MMM; model evaluation and guardrails.

sections.title: Reporting & Decisions
sections.content: Dashboards, cohort views, budget reallocation rules, and experimentation interplay.

sections.title: Compliance & Privacy
sections.content: Consent management, regional rules, differential privacy options, and opt-out handling.
